alert.note: Alert for McHenry; McLean; Mercer; Pierce (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 3:37PM CST until November 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST/11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...McHenry, Pierce, McLean, and Mercer Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST/11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Storm Warning, from Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to Midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
